cases.title: Add TODO
cases.description: Add a TODO using the input field at the top.
cases.preconditions: Write the TODO in the input field at the top and press "Add".
cases.postconditions: The TODO should appear in the in the list below.

cases.title: Check TODO
cases.description: Clicking a TODO should cross it out.
cases.preconditions: There is a TODO item in the list.
cases.postconditions: Clicking it makes the item become crossed out and moves it to the other crossed out items.

cases.title: Uncheck TODO
cases.description: Clicking a crossed out TODO uncrosses it.
cases.preconditions: There is a TODO item in the list that is crossed out.
cases.postconditions: Clicking it uncrosses the item and moves it to the other uncrossed items.

cases.title: Delete TODO
cases.description: Deleting a TODO removes it from the item list.
cases.preconditions: There is a TODO, crossed out or not, in the list.
cases.postconditions: Clicking the respective delete button removes it from the list.

cases.title: Checked TODOs are moved to the bottom
cases.description: All crossed out/checked TODOs have to be moved to the bottom of the list.
cases.preconditions: There are multiple TODOs in the list.
cases.postconditions: When they are crossed out, they should be moved to the bottom portion of the list.
